LanguageData.Pa_PaK38ATG.label: 5cm Pak 38/L60 Anti-Tank Gun
LanguageData.Pa_Flak41AA.label: 5cm Flak41/L67 Anti-Aircraft Gun
LanguageData.Turret_Pak38ATG.label: 5cm PaK 38 ATG
LanguageData.Turret_Pak38ATG.description: PaK 38/L60 50mm Anti-Tank Gun, an ancient Mid War Light Anti-Tank gun, versatile and fast, kind of obsolete but still usable.
LanguageData.Turret_Flak41AA.label: 5cm Flak 41 AA
LanguageData.Turret_Flak41AA.description: 5cm Flak 41/L67 Anti-Aircraft Gun, an ancient Mid War Medium AA gun, the increased gun size improve its explosive payload, but it also increase its weight and complexity, making it way more expensive and hard to produce.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_PaK38ATG.label: PaK 38/L60 5cm ATG
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_Flak41AA.label: FlaK 41/L67 5cm AA
